channel.title: Pages on Thieu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Thieu's Blog

item.description: About Me Hello everyone, I’m Thieu Nguyen. Currently, I’m a master student (2nd years) in computer science of Hanoi University of Science and Technology (HUST), Hanoi, Vietnam. I’m in love with writing but also very lazy, so I create this blog. This blog basically about my process of studying or saving my thoughts when something happens to me. Hope you have such a good time here. I will make you smile when you read about my story!

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects Open-source libraries 1. MEALPY A collection of the state-of-the-art MEta-heuristics ALgorithms in PYthon (mealpy) Currently, more than 70 metaheuristic algorithms in this library. Link: Source Code 2. OPFUNU A collection of Benchmark functions for numerical optimization problems. Framework of OPtimization FUnction in NUmpy (opfunu) Currently, there are several CEC functions (2005/2008/2010/2013/2014/2015) Link: Source Code 3. PERMETRICS A framework of PERformance METRICS (PerMetrics) for artificial intelligence models Currently, there are 20 metrics for Regression problems.

item.title: Research
item.description: Papers and Codes Conferences table { font-family: arial, sans-serif; border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; } .table_header { border-bottom: 1px solid gray; border-top: 1px solid gray; } .table_header td { font-weight: bold; } .table_tbody tr { background: white !important; } .table_tbody .table_header { background: #f7f8f8 !important; } ID: 1 A resource usage prediction system using functional-link and genetic algorithm neural network for multivariate cloud metrics Authors Thieu Nguyen, Nhuan Tran, Binh Minh Nguyen, Giang Nguyen Conference 2018 IEEE 11th conference on service-oriented computing and applications (SOCA) Ranking: C Publication Date: 2018/11/20 Publisher: IEEE Links: Code -- Latex -- PDF ID: 2 Building resource auto-scaler with functional-link neural network and adaptive bacterial foraging optimization Authors Thieu Nguyen, Binh Minh Nguyen, Giang Nguyen Conference International Conference on Theory and Applications of Models of Computation (TAMC) Ranking: B Publication Date: 2019/4/13 Publisher: Springer, Cham Links: Code -- Latex -- PDF ID: 3 A New Workload Prediction Model Using Extreme Learning Machine and Enhanced Tug of War optimization Authors Thieu Nguyen, Bao Hoang, Giang Nguyen, Binh Minh Nguyen Conference The 11th International Conference on Ambient Systems, Networks and Technologies (ANT) Ranking: B Publication Date: 2020/1/1 Publisher: Elsevier Links: Code -- Latex -- PDF ID: 4 EO-CNN: An Enhanced CNN Model Trained by Equilibrium Optimization for Traffic Transportation Prediction Authors Thieu Nguyen, Giang Nguyen, Binh Minh Nguyen Conference 24th International Conference on Knowledge-Based and Intelligent Information & Engineering Systems (KES) Ranking: B Publication Date: 2020/1/1 Publisher: Elsevier Links: Code -- Latex -- PDF Journals ID: 1 Efficient time-series forecasting using neural network and opposition-based coral reefs optimization Authors Thieu Nguyen, Tu Nguyen, Binh Minh Nguyen, Giang Nguyen Journal International Journal of Computational Intelligence Systems Details Publication Date: 2019/11 Publisher: Atlantis Press Ranking: Q1 IF = 2.
